actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to establish the Social Security Administration as an executive department.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Department of Social Security Act - Redesignates the Social Security Administration as the Department of Social Security, an executive department responsible for administering the programs under titles II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) and XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Social Security Administration as an executive department.
